INSERT INTO

mapper.select:
SELECT A.* FROM( SELECT P.PDT_NO, P.PDT_CATEG_NO, P.PDT_NAME, PO.PDT_OPTION_PRICE, PO.PDT_OPTION_STOCK, P.PDT_INTRO, P.PDT_DESCRIPTION, P.PDT_INGREDIENT, P.PDT_SHIPPING, PC.PDT_FAMILY, PDT_OPTION_FIRST, PDT_OPTION_SECOND, PF.PDT_FILE_PATH, PF.PDT_FILE_ORIGIN, PF.PDT_FILE_PATH ||'/'|| PF.PDT_FILE_UPLOAD "PDT_FILE_UPLOAD", P.PDT_DATE, PDT_GROUP, PDT_MANUFAC, F.FUNDING_NO, CUTTING_DATE, FUNDING_FEE, CUTTING_PRICE, PDT_COUNT
FROM TB_PRODUCT P JOIN TB_PRODUCT_CATEGORY PC ON(P.PDT_CATEG_NO=PC.PDT_CATEG_NO) JOIN TB_PRODUCT_OPTION PO ON P.PDT_NO = PO.PDT_NO JOIN TB_PRODUCT_FILE PF ON P.PDT_NO = PF.PDT_NO JOIN TB_FUNDING F ON P.PDT_NO = F.PDT_NO WHERE PC.PDT_CTEG='A' AND PC.PDT_FAMILY='C' AND PDT_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY PDT_DATE DESC)A WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 4

SELECT A.* FROM( SELECT P.PDT_NO, P.PDT_CATEG_NO, P.PDT_NAME, PO.PDT_OPTION_PRICE, P.PDT_INTRO, P.PDT_DESCRIPTION, P.PDT_INGREDIENT, P.PDT_SHIPPING, PC.PDT_FAMILY, PDT_OPTION_FIRST, PDT_OPTION_SECOND, PF.PDT_FILE_PATH ||'/'|| PF.PDT_FILE_UPLOAD "PDT_FILE_UPLOAD", P.PDT_DATE, PDT_GROUP, PDT_MANUFAC, F.FUNDING_NO, CUTTING_DATE, CUTTING_PRICE, PDT_COUNT, FUNDING_FEE
FROM TB_PRODUCT P JOIN TB_PRODUCT_CATEGORY PC ON(P.PDT_CATEG_NO=PC.PDT_CATEG_NO) JOIN TB_PRODUCT_OPTION PO ON P.PDT_NO = PO.PDT_NO JOIN TB_PRODUCT_FILE PF ON P.PDT_NO = PF.PDT_NO JOIN TB_FUNDING F ON P.PDT_NO = F.PDT_NO WHERE PC.PDT_CTEG='A' AND PC.PDT_FAMILY='C' AND PDT_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY PDT_COUNT DESC)A WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 4
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_PRODUCT P JOIN TB_FUNDING F ON(P.PDT_NO=F.PDT_NO) WHERE PDT_STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT P.PDT_NO, P.PDT_CATEG_NO, P.PDT_NAME, PO.PDT_OPTION_PRICE, PO.PDT_OPTION_STOCK, P.PDT_INTRO, P.PDT_DESCRIPTION, P.PDT_INGREDIENT, P.PDT_SHIPPING, PC.PDT_FAMILY, PDT_OPTION_FIRST, PDT_OPTION_SECOND, PF.PDT_FILE_PATH, PF.PDT_FILE_ORIGIN, PF.PDT_FILE_PATH ||'/'|| PF.PDT_FILE_UPLOAD "PDT_FILE_UPLOAD", P.PDT_DATE, PDT_GROUP, F.FUNDING_NO, PDT_MANUFAC, CUTTING_DATE, FUNDING_FEE, CUTTING_PRICE, PDT_COUNT
FROM TB_PRODUCT P JOIN TB_PRODUCT_CATEGORY PC ON(P.PDT_CATEG_NO=PC.PDT_CATEG_NO) JOIN TB_PRODUCT_OPTION PO ON P.PDT_NO = PO.PDT_NO JOIN TB_PRODUCT_FILE PF ON P.PDT_NO = PF.PDT_NO JOIN TB_FUNDING F ON P.PDT_NO = F.PDT_NO WHERE PDT_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY PDT_DATE DESC

SELECT P.PDT_NO, P.PDT_CATEG_NO, P.PDT_NAME, PO.PDT_OPTION_PRICE, P.PDT_INTRO, P.PDT_DESCRIPTION, P.PDT_INGREDIENT, P.PDT_SHIPPING, PC.PDT_FAMILY, PDT_OPTION_FIRST, PDT_OPTION_SECOND, PF.PDT_FILE_PATH ||'/'|| PF.PDT_FILE_UPLOAD "PDT_FILE_UPLOAD", P.PDT_DATE, PDT_GROUP, PDT_MANUFAC, F.FUNDING_NO, CUTTING_DATE, CUTTING_PRICE, PDT_COUNT, FUNDING_FEE
FROM TB_PRODUCT P JOIN TB_PRODUCT_CATEGORY PC ON(P.PDT_CATEG_NO=PC.PDT_CATEG_NO) JOIN TB_PRODUCT_OPTION PO ON P.PDT_NO = PO.PDT_NO JOIN TB_PRODUCT_FILE PF ON P.PDT_NO = PF.PDT_NO JOIN TB_FUNDING F ON P.PDT_NO = F.PDT_NO WHERE PC.PDT_CTEG='A' AND PC.PDT_FAMILY='C' AND PDT_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY PDT_COUNT DESC

SELECT C.CART_NO, C.USER_NO, C.PDT_NO, C.CART_QUANTITY, PO.PDT_OPTION_PRICE, P.PDT_NAME, P.PDT_SHIPPING, PO.PDT_OPTION_NO, PO.PDT_OPTION_FIRST, PO.PDT_OPTION_PRICE, PF.PDT_FILE_PATH ||'/'|| PF.PDT_FILE_UPLOAD "PDT_FILE_UPLOAD", F.FUNDING_NO, F.CUTTING_DATE, F.FUNDING_FEE, F.CUTTING_PRICE, (C.CART_QUANTITY*PO.PDT_OPTION_PRICE)+F.FUNDING_FEE "TOTAL"
FROM TB_CART C JOIN TB_PRODUCT P ON(C.PDT_NO=P.PDT_NO) JOIN TB_PRODUCT_OPTION PO ON C.PDT_NO = PO.PDT_NO JOIN TB_PRODUCT_FILE PF ON C.PDT_NO = PF.PDT_NO JOIN TB_FUNDING F ON C.PDT_NO = F.PDT_NO WHERE C.USER_NO = #{userNo}
